titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide relief for non-selfgenerating ozone nonattainment areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10539-10540)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 8/3/1994--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to remove a condition on the treatment of ozone nonattainment areas as rural transport areas that permits such treatment only if the nonattainment area does not include, or is not adjacent to, a metropolitan statistical or consolidated metropolitan statistical area.
